function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reliance on social vulnerability index (SVI) for characterizing socio-demographic attributes may not capture all relevant factors related to contagious diseases propagation.","Impact":"Incomplete understanding of vulnerability may lead to ineffective mitigation strategies for contagious diseases propagation.","Mitigation":"Use a combination of multiple indices and data sources to capture a comprehensive understanding of socio-demographic attributes related to contagious diseases propagation.","Technologies":"Data integration and analysis tools for combining and analyzing data from multiple sources.","People":"Urban neighborhoods, especially those with higher vulnerability to contagious diseases propagation.","Owner":"Urban planners, public health officials, and researchers."}]}
